sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Sunnyvale's economy has seen a 5% growth rate, driven by tech sector expansion and increased venture capital investments.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Sunnyvale is approximately $130,000, reflecting the high earning potential in the tech industry.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Sunnyvale are increasingly specializing in tech investments and retirement planning for high-income earners.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), the cost of living in Sunnyvale is significantly above the national average, driven by housing and transportation expenses.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Sunnyvale's real estate market remains competitive, with median home prices exceeding $1.5 million, indicating strong demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Sunnyvale's business climate is favorable for startups, particularly in tech, due to access to funding and talent.
